ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

BOT_TOKEN.description: Heroku App name web url Ex : appname.herokuapp.com

OWNER_ID.description: should be an integer. ID of owner of bot

ALD_USR.description: ALLOWED USERS [ids of user or supergroup] seperate by commas

GD_INDEX_URL.description: Google Drive Index Link should include the base dir also

FORCE_DOCUMENTS.description: Should force evething uploaded into Document

EDIT_SLEEP_SECS.description: Time to wait before edit message

TG_UP_LIMIT.description: should be an integer. Number of seconds to wait before cancelling a torrent.

COMPLETED_STR.description: Character to use as a completed progress

REMAINING_STR.description: Character to use as a incomplete progress

RCLONE_ENABLED.description: Enter your custom gleech command like /gleech1@urgroupname and so on. Default is /gleech
